column5: 2 Treatments were added to my Radiation on Apr 5 & they were taken away on Apr 11 my blood work was off so they sent me home with a follow up appointment on Apr 25th back in KW Grand River, This is what everybody is waiting for after your last treatment of Chemo or Radiation is DONE in LHSC, you get to hit this sucker & Who ever is in the area Claps to help send you off, I warned the 2 people sitting behind it & after I hit it a couple contractors said man that could give someone a heart attack, so I explained what it was for & they said oh that's different lol not everybody hits it as hard as I did lol Thanx for all the Support & Tight Lines SBK  Last Treatment Gong
Great news Richard....just in time for trout opening too! Fantastic!
Glad to hear the good news. Time to rebuild and get to fishing soon.   Art
Good to hear. Now get out and fish!
Don't break the machine! Haha. Good luck!
Wonderful news Richard !!!!
Missed this, that is outstanding news indeed!
Get it on....Bang a gong....Get it on.  http://youtu.be/P4HQbRuWJUU
You've come a long way Richard!! The sunshine has come out and burned off your cloud of doubt!
Fantastic News Captain !!!!!!!!!!!!!! A little bit of faith, and a whole lotta love go a long way.
That is great news.  Made me smile when I watched you bang that Gong!!  Good luck and Enjoy life!
great news richard !!! all the best...get out there and do some fishing !!! you can come with me anytime you want ... walleyes ,bass,im always ready !!!!
Wonderful news Richard, may good health be yours from  now on!
Congrats, and good health to you, SBK!
Great news Richard. WTG. GONG AWAY.
Right on Richard! Bang a gong - get it on.
Glad to hear. Best of luck.  I had the chance to do that today and forgot about it. Wish I had.  Although, I did hit the Gong at Stricklands (Gong sponsor) recently. Hahaha
That is awesome news.
Excellent news SBK, now you've kicked one BIG , these other teams should be a breeze.
That's awesome news Richard
This is fantastic news....congratulations are in order!  All the best to you for a healthy and happy future.

Great to hear SBK  There is some great words of encouragement here. Nice to have a community like this to fall on.  Looking forward to seeing some "SBK's excellent fishing adventures" now!  Cheers, Ron...
Great news indeed!
Just Amazing Richard  No doubt in my mind you could do it.
